name: Defenemy
description:
Place turrets to defeat the oncoming enemy waves, but be careful!  Your turrets know no allegiance, find yourself in their line of fire and you will not be spared.  The more dangerous the field is for enemies, the closer it becomes to your own bullet hell.  Slow down enemies by pushing them into the fire of your turrets and  use your own body to block their path.

Controls: WASD to move, click and drag to place turrets, press space and then a direction key to push enemies in that direction away
